title: Y Combinator 's Sam Altman sees dark future if government can't keep up with tech
content:
Y Combinator President Sam Altman warned Wednesday in an appearance at TechCrunch Disrupt that the future won't be bright unless government does a better job of adapting to the rapid pace of technological evolution.

"The greatest threat to this country is incompetence of governance," he said.
